channel.title: Refusal on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Refusal on Simba Tango

item.title: Bright side
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by renatela It occured to me, that the topic of whom we dance with stirs up a lot of negative feelings. Or rather, with whom we do not dance. We are all concerned about being rejected, having someone not ask us to dance, or saying no when we ask (using the cabeceo, of course!). A milonga is a place to enjoy ourselves, and everybody should dance with whoever they want to dance with.
